data.text: @DailyMirror Covid still rife in England please check figures and take care.

@DailyMirror It definitely  is not. In my little  neck of the woods new cases seem to be emerging every day - in a limited circle of relatives and friends. I'm going back into lockdown next week after seeing those relatives who've tested free just because of my birthday.
@DailyMirror Not much else in the news so we gunna go over this? Where has it been for two weeks
